attributes.action: Prevent the government from cutting welfare benefits
attributes.additional_details: Halt the proposed cuts to pip. For the long twrm sick prople in society
attributes.background: Respect the needs of disabled people . Respecf our human rights on dissability.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
